de.mobilecomp.tcpclient_java

Class TCPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mobilecomp.tcpclient_java.TCPClient

  • public class TCPClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    - connects to a tcp server according to port and address sends a message closes connection optionally can listen to messages from the server - feature not used yet
